==Translingual==
{{Han simplified forms|綠|緑|绿}}

===Etymology===
Japanese {{Han simp|綠|f=彔|t=录}}.

Note the long bottom stroke on 彐, which should not be written as [[ヨ]] – the bottom stroke should extend to the right, past the vertical.

In current form, {{Han compound|糸|录|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みどり}}. Originally referred to new [[bud]]s and [[shoot]]s, later changing via [[metonymy]] to mean {{m|en|green}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|みどり|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|翠}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|みどり}}

# [[green]], the colour [[green]]
# [[verdure]]
# a new [[bud]] or [[shoot]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=みどり|archaic}} in the [[w:Edo period|Edo Period]], an [[apprentice]] to a high-ranking [[courtesan]], from ages six or seven through thirteen or fourteen
# in [[kabuki]] and {{m|ja|浄瑠璃|tr=jōruri||puppet theater}}, performing just the main parts of a work and omitting the {{m|ja|狂言|tr=[[kyōgen]]}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|courtesan's apprentice}} {{ja-r|禿|かぶろ}}
* {{sense|abridged performance}} {{ja-r|見取り|みとり}}, {{ja-r|見取|みとり}}
